author: Denis Broci
description: Originally based on vodka but seemed a shame not to try it as a Daiquiri.
name: Four Leaf Clover
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
